MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Warmingham Grange Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:14am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by damaged equipment on the network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2:37pm on 12th April 2021
